movies.title: Clara Campoamor. La mujer olvidada
movies.plot: A TV Movie about the woman who made feminine suffrage possible in Spain. A film about her fight and the way in which she was forgotten.
movies.simplePlot: A TV Movie about the woman who made feminine suffrage possible in Spain. A film about her fight and the way in which she was forgotten.

biography.placeOfBirth: Valladolid, Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain
biography.bio: Elvira Mínguez was born on July 23, 1965 in Valladolid, Valladolid, Castilla y León, Spain. She is an actress and writer, known for Appel inconnu (2015), Tapas (2005) and Truman (2015).
biography.name: Elvira Mínguez

biography.bio: Antonio de la Torre was born on January 18, 1968 in Málaga, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as Antonio de la Torre Martín. He is an actor, known for Volver (2006), The Last Circus (2010) and The Fury of a Patient Man (2016).
biography.name: Antonio de la Torre

biography.placeOfBirth: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain
biography.bio: Mónica López was born on May 30, 1969 in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain. She is an actress, known for Intacto (2001), In the City (2003) and The Uninvited Guest (2004).
biography.name: Mónica López

biography.bio: Joan Carreras was born in 1973 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Joan Carreras i Valldeperes. He is an actor, known for Máxima pena (2005), An Afternoon in Geneva (2013) and Insensibles (2012).
biography.name: Joan Carreras

biography.bio: Pep Cruz was born in 1948 in Girona, Girona, Catalonia, Spain as Pep Cruz Moratones. He is an actor, known for Ventdelplà (2005), Gran Nord (2012) and El triunfo (2006). He is married to Anna Rosa Cisquella. They have two children.
biography.name: Pep Cruz

biography.bio: Toni Sevilla was born in 1949 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor, known for El cor de la ciutat (2000), The Nameless (1999) and Policías, en el corazón de la calle (2000).
biography.name: Toni Sevilla

biography.bio: Joan Massotkleiner was born on June 21, 1955 in Girona, Girona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor, known for Laberint d'ombres (1998), El cor de la ciutat (2000) and Desierto sur (2008).
biography.name: Joan Massotkleiner

biography.bio: Manel Barceló was born on January 19, 1953 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is an actor and writer, known for Vicky Cristina Barcelona (2008), Sitges (1996) and El cor de la ciutat (2000).
biography.name: Manel Barceló

biography.placeOfBirth: Lloret de Mar, Girona, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Fermí Reixach was born on August 21, 1946 in Lloret de Mar, Girona, Catalonia, Spain as Fermí Reixach García. He is an actor, known for Le parfum - Histoire d'un meurtrier (2006), Darkness (2002) and La Riera (2010).
biography.name: Fermí Reixach

biography.bio: Mingo Ràfols is an actor, known for Nico and Dani (2000), El cor de la ciutat (2000) and Food of Love (2002).
biography.name: Mingo Ràfols

biography.bio: Mar Ulldemolins was born in 1980 in Valls, Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain as Mar Ulldemolins Sarret. She is an actress, known for Ventdelplà (2005), Les coses grans (2013) and Les dues vides d'Andrés Rabadán (2008).
biography.name: Mar Ulldemolins

biography.placeOfBirth: La Seu d'Urgell, Lleida, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Roger Casamajor was born on December 17, 1976 in La Seu d'Urgell, Lleida, Catalonia, Spain as Roger Casamajor Esteban. He is an actor, known for Pan's Labyrinth (2006), El mar (2000) and Pain noir (2010).
biography.name: Roger Casamajor

biography.bio: Sara Espígul is an actress, known for El crac (2014), Les nenes no haurien de jugar al futbol (2014) and Barcelona Summer Night (2013).
biography.name: Sara Espígul

biography.bio: Montserrat Carulla was born on September 19, 1930 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Montserrat Carulla i Ventura. She is an actress, known for The Orphanage (2007), El cor de la ciutat (2000) and Oh, Espanya! (1996).
biography.name: Montserrat Carulla

biography.bio: Jordi Sánchez was born in 1964 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Jordi Sánchez Zaragoza. He is an actor and writer, known for Plats bruts (1999), L'un per l'altre (2003) and Nico and Dani (2000).
biography.name: Jordi Sánchez
